search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Mailgun (mailgun.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Mailgun can be found at [https://www.mailgun.com/pricing/](https://www.mailgun.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Flexible Email Delivery & API Pricing Plans | Mailgun | Mailgun

Enterprise services
-------------------

Partner with Mailgun to create an enterprise-grade solution for delivering email at scale. Includes everything in the Scale plan plus custom features, Deliverability Services, and Rapid Fire Burst Sending SLA.

[Request A Quote](https://www.mailgun.com/contact/sales/)

![Image 22: An enterprise reporting graph.](https://images.ctfassets.net/y6oq7udscnj8/4smIIr9FYyjy1gosNBeZCv/6ad043fe203088ea810d03702950ab54/EN-MG-Data-reporting.png?w=1424&h=781&q=50&fm=png)

Email experiences that connect

Why leading brands choose Mailgun
---------------------------------

Control all of the variables you need to succeed with email – from pre-deployment through successful delivery. Mailgun combines a feature-rich email delivery platform with an intuitive email editor and deliverability solutions like inbox preview rendering and email address validation so you can send smarter. That's why we're trusted to send over 240 billion emails a year.

### Choose where your data lives

Send email through the US or the EU from a single account. Mailgun’s service is hosted within both regions, so your data can remain in the region of your choice.

### Get world-class, localized support

You have a team of email geeks ready to help. With Mailgun, we're here for you at the support level you need – whether you're looking for ticket assistance, chat support, or even a local deliverability expert in your region.

### Send smarter with AI-powered tools

Stay ahead of the curve with innovative solutions that drive results. Mailgun helps you reach each person on your list at exactly the right time for maximum engagement.

Need answers? We got 'em

Frequently asked questions
--------------------------

### How can I upgrade my account?

You can upgrade your account at any time to get more volume or more features (or both) from within your account settings.

### How does Mailgun work?

Mailgun is an email delivery and deliverability service that empowers businesses to easily send email from their applications. We’ve built a powerful, cloud-based infrastructure that scales gracefully and handles billions of emails per month so you don’t have to deal with the complexity and hassle of maintaining your own servers. It’s free to sign up and easy to get started. Read our docs for more info on how Mailgun works.

### How does your billing work?

Upon signup, you will only be billed the prorated amount of the selected plan for the current month. After that, your monthly plan cost and any extra emails and validations you use will be billed at the start of each month for the previous month. If you decide to cancel your account, any remaining balance due will be charged before the account can be closed.

### How do I send my emails with Mailgun?

Since Mailgun exposes both an HTTP API and an SMTP endpoint, you can choose to send the way you’d like. Both ways have their advantages… SMTP is easy to setup and often plug and play, but API is much more reliable at scale. If you’re building an application, we recommend using our HTTP API.

One thing to note: There’s no send button in Mailgun, so if that’s what you’re looking for, contact us and we’ll point you in the right direction.

### How many dedicated IPs do I need? Can I get more?

While some customers are happy on our shared IPs, others prefer the benefit of dedicated IPs, which give you more control over your reputation and deliverability. One dedicated IP is included with Foundation 100k, Growth and Scale plans.

The number of dedicated IPs you need depends on your volume, the types of email you're sending, and your frequency. Considering no two senders are alike, it can be hard to give a blanket recommendation, but with [Mailgun Optimize's Deliverability Services](https://www.mailgun.com/solutions/email-deliverability-service/), your TAM can investigate and advise on the exact number and types of IPs that best suite your business. Otherwise, you can add additional IPs to your account for $59/IP/month from within the control panel or by contacting support.

### How many users come with each plan?

Every Mailgun plan (except free and basic) allows you to add as many users as you need to your account at no additional cost. We find that this keeps people from sharing login credentials (a security no-no), and it makes you happy. Win win. You can also manage user permissions with our five user roles. Read more about our [role-based access control](https://www.mailgun.com/blog/product/5-user-roles-access-control-permissions-mailgun-account/). Free plans are limited to 1 user per account.

### I want to test out Mailgun first. How can I do that?

There are several ways to give Mailgun a try. First, our free plan allows you to explore the platform with all the fundamentals needed to start sending with a daily sending cap. If you’re looking for something more, our paid plans offer free 30-day trials that provided unlimited access to higher tier features like:

*   Ticket/Chat/Phone support, dependent on plan
    
*   Longer durations of log retention
    
*   Better account security with SAML SSO integration
